mapper.select: SELECT A.ITEMS_ID ,A.TITLE ,A.ITEMS_STATE ,A.PRICE ,A.UP_DATE ,C.USER_ID ,C.AREA FROM ITEMS A,USER_INFO C; ORDER BY ITEMS_ID DESC;

SELECT A.ITEMS_ID, A.TITLE, A.ITEMS_STATE, A.PRICE, A.USER_ID, A.UP_DATE, B.ITEMS_IMG_ID, D.TAG_CONT FROM ITEMS A LEFT JOIN ITEMS_IMG B ON A.ITEMS_IMG_ID = B.ITEMS_IMG_ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TAG_INFO D ON A.TAG_ID = D.TAG_ID WHERE A.ITEMS_ID = A.#{items_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ITEMS(ITEMS_ID, TITLE, ITEMS_STATE, PRICE, UP_DATE, ITEMS_IMG_ID,USER_ID,TAG_ID) values('B'||ITEMS_ID.nextval, #{title}, #{items_state}, #{price}, sysdate,NULL,NULL,NULL)
insert into ITEMS_IMG(ITEMS_IMG_ID, PATH_IMG, FILE_NAME) values('I'||ITEMS_IMG_ID.nextval, NULL,#{file_name})
